body.p: Always tighten electrical component (CBs, contactors, etc.) connections to the manufacturerâ€™s torque specifications furnished with the component. Torque ratings vary. Please refer to label on the part.
Use standard guidelines for electrical components if no manufacturer data is available.
Tighten connections using Belleville type (spring) washers until washers are flat.
There is a wide variety of torque requirements for terminal blocks of various sizes.
